general.gigTitle: build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Custom WordPress Website Design, Custom Shopify Store, Shopify CRO
sellerCard.description:
I’m a skilled developer passionate about creating websites, e-commerce stores that are both visually stunning and highly functional. Whether you’re refreshing your site or starting from scratch, I focus on clean code, efficiency, and user-friendly designs.  

What I offer:
- Custom website development tailored to your vision.  
- Shopify Development
- UI/UX Design
- Responsive designs for all devices.  
- Secure and reliable solutions.  
- Performance optimization for faster load times.  
- Expertise in e-commerce with Shopify and WordPress.  

Let’s bring your ideas to life! 🚀

description.content:
This gig is for you if

  • You are a startup
  • Want to scale your business, blog or organization
  • Need app

I design/create a Modern WordPress Website Design, to meet your ultimate requirements.


My specialities are:

  1. UI/UX Design
  2. Headless CMS (Wordpress, Contentful, Sanity.io, Dato, Storyblok, Strapi)
  3. Websites & Apps Design & Development
  4. Custom application development (React, Node.js, Mongo DB, Headless CMS)
  5. Custom Shopify Stores


I'm offering the following services


  1. Responsive Modern WordPress Website
  2. Redesign Wordpress
  3. SEO Friendly WordPress Blog
  4. Admin panel
  5. SEO Friendly URL & Page structure.
  6. Better UI/UX (according to Modern Design standards)
  7. Enhanced Security
  8. Social Media Integration, Contact Forms, Google Maps, Newsletter Subscription, Memberships, Bookings Integration, Job posting features
  9. Security plugin integration
  10. Google Analytics & Google Search Console integration
  11. Speed Optimization
  12. SSL Integration


In Ecommerce Website


  1. Complete E-commerce Solution for WordPress website using Woocommerce Plugin
  2. Products upload
  3. Payment system integration (Paypal, Stripe, Credit Cards, Debit Cards)
  4. Customisable Shop
  5. Facebook Pixel/Google Tag Manager integration
  6. SEO enabled
  7. Dropshipping

questionsAndAnswers.question: How good are you in English?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Its been so long working with US based clients. So my English skills definitely getting enhanced. I can easily read / write / speak English without any problem. That helps me understanding the clients requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to explain well about your business, so after having enough information I'll be guiding you for the next steps which might be 1) Getting domain for your business 2) Hosting for your business and very easy steps

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build custom websites or templates?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you have some custom job. You can inbox and discuss the job in details & i'll be building a template / plugin right following your exact requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide license with Plugins / Themes?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No i don't provide licenses with themes or plugins. If you request, i'll add license & modify the order cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is meant by premium themes?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We've purchased lot of premium themes from different developers. Those themes are so customizable and highly responsive. So we'll be using that for our websites. Incase you need something different, we can talk about that.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the site be responsive and SEO ready?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the websites will definitely be Responsive and SEO ready. So no need to worry about anything.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you write content / text or make images for website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No! I don't write content / text and images for website. You will need to provide i) Website content which make include text / images / videos or PDFs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build Multi-lingual websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, mostly while building a multi-national business like bigger brands, A websites needs to be in multiple languages. So we definitely need to prepare our website for this. I'll help you building Bilingual / Multi-lingual websites with premium plugin (WPML). I've developer license for this plugin.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert PSD's or PDF into Wordpress / Websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, PSD's or PDF to Wordpress Website conversion is a small part of my skills area. Since having a proper design direction (PDF / PSD) always help to get things completed as soon as possible even with quality. But you have to contact me before placing an order to get a quality work done :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why to chose Wordpress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Wordpress is one of the most popular CMS (content management system) that can help you managing your website without coding knowledge but drag and drop instead. You just need to ask me for an intro video and you'll be good to manage everything under simple clicks.

openGraph.title: build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development

reviews.comment: Rabia's work was absolutely TOP-NOTCH—flawless execution with incredible attention to detail and professionalism. She deeply understood my needs, responded quickly, and delivered right on time. Highly recommend her for any website development project! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the glowing feedback! 😊

reviews.comment: We had the pleasure of working with Rabia and her talented team on our web development and design project, and they exceeded our expectations. From start to finish, they were professional, communicative, and committed to delivering high-quality results. I highly recommend working with them.
She did amazing job. Thank you +++

reviews_snippet.comment: By far the best person I have worked with on Fiver. Her patience level was out of this world, I had quite a few changes lol and every-time it was nothing but patience and love. She was very professional and detail oriented. I have additional sites to build and I am definitely using her again.

Rabia is a professional. I provided some websites I liked as well as my line of work, Rabia did the research and came back with a great website for my company. She has a great eye for web design and the underlying technologies. Rabia was fast with delivering high quality work with fast turnaround. She was very responsive and patient throughout the entire process. I was sick and she worked with me patiently even though that meant the payment to her would be delayed. I highly recommend her as a person and as a web designer/developer.
Thank you, Rabia, for an excellent job. You were accommodating of all my changes and very responsive. The website looks great, thank you.
The seller was easy to work with and responded in a timely manner. The fact that we are 10 hours apart in time of day makes it a bit of a challenge. It was a good experience.

Liked working with rabia as always. Delivered on time and with the same quality as I expected. Now I am willing to get you onboard for a monthly reporting, bug fixing and maintenance of my landing page. Thanks a lot Rabia
